task.title: Printing a View or Workspace
task.shortdesc: You can print the workspace or an individual view and display a preview beforehand.

context.p: Do any of the following to see a print preview or print the workspace or selected view:

ul.li: To see a print preview of the workspace, click File > Print Preview.
To print the current workspace, click File > Print.
To see a print preview of the view, right-click in the view and click Print preview.
To print the view, right-click in the view and click Print.

taskbody.result: When you print a table that has more columns than will fit the width of the page, they will wrap to the next page. If there are more rows than will fit on the page, they are displayed on subsequent pages.
taskbody.postreq:
The printing mechanism used by Tivoli Enterprise Portal is provided by Java, and has some limitations. When you print a notepad view, the text prints as an image. If you want a better quality, try selecting and copying the text (Ctrl+C), then pasting into your favorite text editor for formatting and printing. When you print a workspace or chart, try sizing the application window or view pane smaller to improve the clarity of the printed copy. You can also use the Print Screen key.
As an alternative to printing in Marvel Enterprise Portal, you can export the view to a comma separated value (.csv) file or text (.txt) file, then import it into the program of your choice, and print there.

link.desc: Save some or all of the data that was retrieved by the query for a view in a text (.txt) file or comma separated value (.csv) file for further manipulation in another software application.
